title: [OffTopic] Improve my roadmap(I want to excel in Robotics and satellites communication and navigation

comments.body: I would recommend reaching out to seniors/alumni in the field before making a roadmap for yourself. They will have better insights and help you plan ahead.
Stop making roadmaps, you're not even in 1st year yet, explore stuff out of genuine interest.

I appreciate the advise. However, since my teenage years, I've been deeply immersed in programming with Python, Java, and JavaScript, which has fueled my passion for coding. I fell in love with robotics and telecommunications in my 12th grade year,and I'm eager to explore these fields further.
Just curious, why did you take CS instead of ECE if your into robotics and communication?
